name: Pain for Pain
description: When this character takes at least 3 DMG: Negates 1 DMG, then apply Sheer Cold or Blazing Heat to the opposing active character based on La Signora's state. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: When this character takes at least 3 DMG: Negates 1 DMG, then apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C121022]</color> or <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C163011]</color> to the opposing active character based on $[A2102]'s state. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: When this character takes at least 3 DMG: Negates 1 DMG, then apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sheer Cold</color> or <color=#FFFFFFFF>Blazing Heat</color> to the opposing active character based on La Signora's state. (Once per Round)
